title: ğŸ“ What They Really Mean
content:
- **`len()`** â†’ How many items are *actually there* ğŸ§®
- **`cap()`** â†’ How many items it *can hold before breaking* ğŸ“¦

title: ğŸ’» Quick Go Example
content:
```go
nums := make([]int, 3, 5)
fmt.Println(len(nums)) // 3
fmt.Println(cap(nums)) // 5

nums = append(nums, 10, 20)
fmt.Println(len(nums)) // 5
fmt.Println(cap(nums)) // 5

nums = append(nums, 30)
fmt.Println(len(nums)) // 6
fmt.Println(cap(nums)) // 10 // ğŸ”¥ doubled!
```
